name: Goblin Den
creatures: Goblin Minion, Goblin Warrior, Goblin Boss, Goblin Hexer
description: A small band of goblins lie in wait to ambush intruders entering Undermountain.
aiRoomPrompt: A small basement room, underneath a typical home in Waterdeep that has been turned into a goblin den. The floor is wooden but covered in debris, including a small area in the southeast corner of the room that has been barricaded off with crates, barrels and broken furniture. A few torches on the walls provide dim light.

name: Tiger's Den
description: A Waterdavian noble's exotic pet Tiger has gotten loose and is roaming the dungeon. Kill it to ensure it doesn't hurt anyone or capture and return it for a reward!

name: Bugbear Abduction
description: A pair of Bugbears hunt adventurers to abduct and bring back to their lair.

name: Toss Me
description: A broken bridge over a bottomless pit tests the parties jumping ability. I hope they brought a rope... 2 doors across the chasm for better rewards, 1 door on your side for a hard fight.

name: Troll Bridge
description: A bored Troll charges a toll of 10gp to cross his bridge, but will gladly smash anyone who won't pay.

name: Three Boxes
description: The classic parlor puzzle from the Blue Prince: https://blue-prince.fandom.com/wiki/Parlor_Puzzle

name: Goblin Warband
creatures: Goblin Minion, Goblin Warrior, Goblin Boss, Goblin Hexer
description: A goblin warband lies in wait to ambush intruders develing deeper into Undermountain.

name: Goblins!!!
creatures: Goblin Minion, Goblin Warrior, Goblin Boss, Goblin Hexer
description: An elite goblin strike force defends its territory deep within Undermountain

name: Wyrmling Lair
creatures: [dragon type] Dragon Wyrmling, Kobold, Winged Kobold
description: A dragon wyrmling has gathered a band of kobolds to help it amass a hoard.

name: Adult Dragon Lair
description: An ancient dragon rests in its lair, surrounded by centuries of accumulated treasure.
